string.text: Eck (while bending his back) doesn't the number of zeros confuse you? Okay here's your money. I hope that this is enough. Come on tell me.

Do not kill me! Alenka is waiting for me there. I have some information for you. You know, I'm there on my own and the clerk was sitting at a computer fiddling with documents and records. And then I noticed an every day brother stalker in a coffin that stunk unbearably! Disgusting anyway, forget about that for now. There I read a file by accident about how to hack the code. I did not make a copy, but I remember exactly. There was a report about changing artifacts into anomalies. Go figure! So it says that if you take some ME ... 'meso' something there ... called 'Beads Great-Grandmother' - the name of debility, just remember, just do not ask what it is, I can not even imagine and put it in 'Carousel', then ten minutes later you will get another artifact. Well like the other ... the same, only it will swap properties. It radiates a field that when anything flies into it the object will slow down perceptibly. I thought, that meant it will help with bullet wounds, hence it stops bleeding and improves health, and it glows. There, I hope this information will help you more than it did me ... and it is my life ... thou shalt not kill, Strelok, eh?
Perhaps the best detector in the area, although it must be repaired.
The schematic for configuring the detector.
Having the schematic for this detector will allow us to make adjustments that will allow detection of almost any anomaly.
Individual PDA of a stalker. Storage of personal information and data necessary for survival in the Zone.
Common flash drive, they are frequently encountered in the Zone.
Detector, the latest development in the field of mechanization research of paranormal phenomena to detect and identify virtually any anomaly in the Zone.
The diagram of military underground communications.
Diagram of the subterranean communications of the military. Diagrams and plans of subterranean catacombs.

The artifact is rarely found around anomaly 'Elektra'. Has formation of an amorphous translucent glowing core, emitting little sparks around it. Wearing the artifact on the belt significantly increases endurance. But if it enters the anomaly of "Elektra," the chances of survival for a person wearing this artifact is minimum. Price is very high. Interest in the artifact exhibit scientific organizations, collectors and jewelers
The metallic case of Freeman. A usual case for transporting money and documents.
Common Army VHF radio, but in terms of circuitry, its outdated vacuum tube design was the most resistant to various types of radiation.
Laptop with data that contains information about the underground communications around the Sarcophagus.
Journal of records about the Sarcophagus. Detailed records of behavior of the Monolith for years. Many, many letters and numbers. There are photos too.
Journal of records about the Sarcophagus.
A small metal container of Montpensier Fruit Drops.
Communications plan from Lab X-16. Among other things a marked secret passage to the Sarcophagus.
Case with the money for the scientist.
Case with the experiments. Has three rows with litres of fluid.
PDA of mercenary without a name. Only nickname is 'Eighth' and a strange code.
PDA of mercenary without the name. Only nickname is 'Seventh' and a strange code.
PDA of mercenary without the name. Only nickname 'Sixth' and a strange code.
Flash drive of mercenary without the name. Only nickname is 'Fourth' and a strange code.
Flash drive of mercenary without the name. Only nickname is 'Fifth' and a strange code.
Particular variety of the 'Slice of Meat'. Can only be found near Chernobyl and is extremely rare. It possesses some properties different from the common 'Slice of Meat'.
PDA of mercenary without the name. Only nickname is 'Third' and a strange code.
Album with the photographs and personal recordings by Grinya.
Heavy wooden box. Inside, zinc ammunition.
Volumne 1 from Laboratory x-16. Research showing formulas and graphs. Apparently this laboratory conducted studies on animals and humans.
Volumne 2 from Laboratory X-16. Research showing formulas and graphs. Apparently this laboratory conducted studies on animals and humans.
Volumne 3 from Laboratory X-16. Research showing formulas and graphs. Apparently this laboratory conducted studies on animals and humans.
Flash drive of mercenary without a name. Only nickname is 'First' and a strange code.
Flash drive of mercenary without a name. Only nickname is 'Second' and a strange code.
Something like a powerful electronic lockpick. It seems that it was set up to crack a specific electronic lock.
Documents for Dan. Sealed folder from Sviblov
Metal box with the things of Sidorovich. With a heavy duty lock.
NPC does not have enough money
There are currently no active votes.
